description.english: Here begins your journey through the Shadows of Duat.
description.spanish: Aquí comienza tu viaje por las sombras de la Duat.

displayName.english: Under the wings of the Triad
displayName.spanish: Bajo las alas de la Tríada

description.english: Arrives for the first time at the Sanctuary.
description.spanish: Llega por primera vez al Santuario.

displayName.spanish: La muerte es sólo el principio

description.english: Break the hand and get the gun.
description.spanish: Rompe la mano y consigue la pistola.

displayName.english: Facing the gates of the Duat
displayName.spanish: Ante las puertas de la Duat

displayName.english: The laws of the Old Kingdom

displayName.spanish: El final del viaje de Ra

description.english: Steal something from the Red-Eyed Sphinx's room and live to tell the tale.
description.spanish: Roba algún objeto de la sala de la esfinge de ojos rojos y vive para contarlo.

description.english: Get Revolver No. 3. Reward: If you finish the game with this weapon in your inventory, you will have it from the beginning in new games.
description.spanish: Consigue el Revolver Nº3. Recompensa: Lo tendrás desde el principio en nuevas partidas.

description.english: Kill 3 or more Ushebtis with a single shot.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 o más Ushebtis de un solo tiro.

description.english: Kill 5 enemies in a short period of time.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 enemigos en un corto lapso de tiempo.

displayName.english: Your feat will not be remembered

description.english: Beat the game without saving the game even once.
description.spanish: Pasate el juego sin guardar partida ni una sola vez.

description.english: Save Professor Hamouda. Reward: Character unlocked! You can start a new game as the Sage.
description.spanish: Salva al Profesor Hamouda. Recompensa: ¡Personaje desbloqueado! Podrás iniciar nueva partida como el Erudito.

displayName.english: An-Ren something, cultists whatever... shut up!
The luck of the one-armed man
Well, he would have used the shovel
displayName.spanish: Pues que hubiera usado la pala

description.english: Help Samira defeat An-Ren. Reward: Character unlocked! You can start a new game as the Mercenary.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Samira. Recompensa: ¡Personaje desbloqueado! Podrás iniciar nueva partida como la Mercenaria.

displayName.english: I'm sure she'll do fine alone...
displayName.spanish: Seguro que le va bien sola...

description.english: You have been inside the tomb for 1 hour.
description.spanish: Llevas 1 hora dentro de la tumba.

description.english: You've been inside the tomb for 2 hours.
description.spanish: Llevas 2 horas dentro de la tumba.

description.english: You've been inside the tomb for 4 hours.
description.spanish: Llevas 4 horas dentro de la tumba.

description.english: You've been inside the tomb for 6 hours.
description.spanish: Llevas 6 horas dentro de la tumba.

description.english: You have been inside the tomb for 8 hours.
description.spanish: Llevas 8 horas dentro de la tumba.

description.english: You have been inside the tomb for 12 hours.
description.spanish: Llevas 12 horas dentro de la tumba.

description.english: Fail 6 times in a puzzle. Is it really that difficult?
description.spanish: Falla 6 veces en un puzzle. ¿De verdad es tan difícil?

description.english: Fail 12 times in a puzzle. Oh really…
description.spanish: Falla 12 veces en un puzzle. En serio...

description.english: Fail 24 times in a puzzle. Make sure you have the game in a language you know.
description.spanish: Falla 24 veces en un puzzle. Asegurate de tener el juego en un idioma que conozcas.

description.english: Fail 36 times in a puzzle. Get a brain.
description.spanish: Falla 36 veces en un puzzle. Consigue un cerebro.

description.english: Fall into 6 traps. You didn't see that...
description.spanish: Cae en 6 trampas. No viste eso...

description.english: Fall into 24 traps. You can adjust the difficulty in the options menu. Just joking.
description.spanish: Cae en 24 trampas. Puedes ajustar la dificultad en el menú de opciones. Es broma.

description.english: Fall into 36 traps. Get some eyes.
description.spanish: Cae en 36 trampas. Consigue unos ojos.

description.english: You have met An-Ren for the first time.
description.spanish: Te has encontrado con An-Ren por primera vez.

description.english: The An-Ren has transformed and now carries a bow.
description.spanish: El An-Ren se ha transformado y ahora va con un arco.

description.english: The An-Ren has transformed and now casts spells.
description.spanish: El An-Ren se ha transformado y ahora lanza hechizos.

description.english: The An-Ren has transformed and is now teleporting.
description.spanish: El An-Ren se ha transformado y ahora se teleporta.

displayName.english: And let's hope he's really dead...
displayName.spanish: Y esperemos que esté bien muerto...

description.english: You have killed the An-Ren... for the first time.
description.spanish: Has matado al An-Ren... por primera vez.

description.english: You have killed the An-Ren for the third time.
description.spanish: Has matado al An-Ren por tercera vez.

description.english: You have killed the An-Ren for the fifth time.
description.spanish: Has matado al An-Ren por quinta vez.

description.english: You have killed the An-Ren for the ninth time.
description.spanish: Has matado al An-Ren por novena vez.

description.english: You have killed the An-Ren for the thirteenth time.
description.spanish: Has matado al An-Ren por decimotercera vez.
Derrota a la gran esfinge de ojos rojos.
Derrota a la gran esfinge de ojos azules.

description.english: Obtain the magic mace "Punishment of Atum".
description.spanish: Consigue la maza mágica "el Castigo de Atum".

description.english: Obtain the magic spear "Wrath of Ra".
description.spanish: Consigue la lanza mágica "la Ira de Ra".

displayName.spanish: La puntería de un soldado de asalto

displayName.english: Wait, is that the cannon of a plane?
displayName.spanish: Espera, ¿eso es el cañón de una avioneta?
La llave que todo lo abre

description.english: Get to see the perfect ending of the game in Normal Mode.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final perfecto del juego en Modo Normal.

displayName.english: It was hard but we did it

description.english: Get to see the good ending of the game.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final bueno del juego.

description.english: Get to see the bad ending of the game.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final malo del juego.

displayName.english: The last dawn of the Earth
displayName.spanish: El último amanecer de la Tierra

description.english: Get to see the disastrous ending of the game in Normal Mode.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final nefasto del juego en Modo Normal.

description.english: Get all 4 endings of the game. Reward: You have a small present in the next Khepri chest...
description.spanish: Consigue los 4 finales del juego. Recompensa: Tienes un pequeño regalo en el próximo cofre de Khepri...

description.english: Complete the game in Story Mode.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en Modo Historia.

description.english: Get to see the perfect ending of the game in Story Mode.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final perfecto del juego en Modo Historia.

description.english: Get to see the disastrous ending of the game in Story Mode.
description.spanish: Consigue ver el final nefasto del juego en Modo Historia.

description.english: Let the An-Ren get crushed in the main hall on the third level.
description.spanish: Deja que el An-Ren quede aplastado en el salón principal del tercer nivel.

description.english: Finish the game without taking damage from enemies.
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin recibir daño de enemigos.

description.english: Finish the game in less than 3 hours.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de 3 horas.

description.english: Finish the game in less than 1 hour.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de 1 hora.
